name: memory_brain
description: Local Memory Search Engine. Allows LobeChat to mount a drive, scan files, and search memories.

functions.name: mount_drive
functions.description: Mounts a directory containing photos so it can be indexed.

functions.name: scan_drive
functions.description: Scans the mounted directory for photos and indexes them.

functions.name: search_memories
functions.description: Search for memories using natural language.

functions.name: get_memory
functions.description: Retrieve full metadata for a memory entry.
